alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 22 at 3:41AM MDT until March 22 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING HAS BEEN ISSUED FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...North winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Las Animas, Prowers, and Baca Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Travel will be difficult, especially for lightweight and high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
